SubSections.Title: Bypass Basic Security
SubSections.Content: Hack simple password-locked systems.

SubSections.Title: Disrupt Cameras
SubSections.Content: Temporarily disable or loop security camera footage.

SubSections.Title: Hack Doors
SubSections.Content: Unlock or lock electronic doors.

SubSections.Title: Bypass Firewalls
SubSections.Content: Access secured computer networks with basic encryption.

SubSections.Title: Disable Alarms
SubSections.Content: Shut down, delay, or loop an active alarm system.

SubSections.Title: Clone Access Keys
SubSections.Content: Duplicate an authorized user's credentials, keycards, or biometric data for security bypass.

SubSections.Title: Disable User Accounts
SubSections.Content: Lock or restrict an account within a compromised system to prevent a legitimate user from regaining control.

SubSections.Title: Hijack Drones
SubSections.Content: Remotely take control of surveillance or combat drones.

SubSections.Title: Overload Electronics
SubSections.Content: Cause an overheat or short circuit in tech devices.

SubSections.Title: Forge Identification
SubSections.Content: Create fake digital credentials or security IDs.

SubSections.Title: Scramble Communications
SubSections.Content: Jam or block radio/cybernetic communications in a small area.

SubSections.Title: Hijack Smart Systems
SubSections.Content: Gain access to or remote control over automated systems such as security locks, cameras, thermal regulators, or automated defenses.

SubSections.Title: Jam Surveillance
SubSections.Content: Flood surveillance systems with false or corrupted data, effectively blinding them.

SubSections.Title: Trigger False Alarms
SubSections.Content: Force security systems to generate fake alerts, creating distractions or forcing personnel to respond to phantom threats.

SubSections.Title: Extract Files
SubSections.Content: Find and download sensitive digital data from a secure system.

SubSections.Title: Trace Digital Footprint
SubSections.Content: Follow someone’s online or computer activity history.

SubSections.Title: Decrypt Data
SubSections.Content: Unlock encrypted files or intercepted messages.

SubSections.Title: Erase Records
SubSections.Content: Remove someone’s existence from digital records or databases.

SubSections.Title: Reconstruct Deleted Files
SubSections.Content: Recover data that has been erased or corrupted, restoring partial or full files.

SubSections.Title: Deep System Search
SubSections.Content: Recursively scrape all connected devices and systems for certain pieces of data.

SubSections.Title: Verify Data Authenticity
SubSections.Content: Analyze digital records or messages for signs of tampering or fabrication.

SubSections.Title: Spoof Access Credentials
SubSections.Content: Generate temporary fake login credentials to bypass user authentication.

SubSections.Title: Monitor Network Traffic
SubSections.Content: Observe data flow within a system to detect anomalies or locate specific transmissions.

SubSections.Title: Deploy Malware
SubSections.Content: Plant a virus or backdoor in a system for future access or to disrupt functionality.

SubSections.Title: Bypass Network Restrictions
SubSections.Content: Break through geoblocking, firewalls, and traffic filters to access restricted content.

SubSections.Title: Corrupt Data Transfers
SubSections.Content: Intercept and replace or corrupt files being transferred between systems.

SubSections.Title: Detect Intrusion Attempts
SubSections.Content: Monitor for signs of unauthorized access or hacking attempts on a system.

SubSections.Title: Scrub Digital Presence
SubSections.Content: Erase or alter traces of recent activity to avoid detection or tracing.

SubSections.Title: Intecept Signals
SubSections.Content: Protect against hacking attacks, denial of service, and spam.

SubSections.Title: Honeytrap
SubSections.Content: Create a fake system with fake data to trick and monitor hacking attempts.

SubSections.Title: Trace Intrusion Origin
SubSections.Content: Trace attacks to a source, such as locations, persons, or organizations.

SubSections.Title: Train AI
SubSections.Content: Develop a simple AI to analyze or help with simple tasks.

SubSections.Title: Prompt Injection
SubSections.Content: Provide specific data to an AI to provide you with unauthorized data that it has access to.

SubSections.Title: AI Detection
SubSections.Content: Differentiate original content from low effort AI generated content.

SubSections.Title: Content Flood
SubSections.Content: Overload a communication system such as a user network or a messaging service with fake users and engagement, or flood an email with spam.

SubSections.Title: AI Infiltration
SubSections.Content: Gain access to secret information from friends or colleagues of a target by speaking or writing like the target, or otherwise get them to believe or act upon lies.

SubSections.Title: Repair Machine
SubSections.Content: Fix a damaged vehicle, ship, mech, or other mechanical structure.

SubSections.Title: Construct Devices
SubSections.Content: Assemble functional tools, gadgets, or other simple machines from components.

SubSections.Title: Modify Machine
SubSections.Content: Alter an existing machine to have simple new functions or improved performance, or to inject custom behavior.

SubSections.Title: Diagnose Mechanical Failures
SubSections.Content: Identify the probable cause of a malfunction in a complex mechanical structure.

SubSections.Title: Scanner
SubSections.Content: Scan your surroundings for hidden metals, machines, and electronics.

SubSections.Title: Analyze Blueprints
SubSections.Content: Understand the function and design of an unknown machine, revealing weaknesses and how to build it from scratch.

SubSections.Title: Salvage Parts
SubSections.Content: Safely dismantle objects to extract useful electronic or mechanical components.

SubSections.Title: Bypass Power Grid
SubSections.Content: Redirect or cut the power supply of a system or area.

SubSections.Title: Repurpose Device
SubSections.Content: Modify an existing object for an unintended function, such as turning a weapon’s targeting system into a tracking sensor.

SubSections.Title: Reconstruct Source Code
SubSections.Content: Retrieve embedded programming from a technological device to analyze or modify its behavior.

SubSections.Title: Run Simulation
SubSections.Content: Run a partial reconstruction of a machine’s or program's processes in a virtual model to predict how it works.

SubSections.Title: Analyze Material Properties
SubSections.Content: Determine the composition and structural integrity of a material.

SubSections.Title: Reinforce Structures
SubSections.Content: Temporarily strengthen a surface or structure to resist damage or stress.

SubSections.Title: Detect Weak Points
SubSections.Content: Identify areas in a material or structure vulnerable to stress, breakage, or manipulation.

SubSections.Title: Create Materials
SubSections.Content: Synthesize metal composites with predetermined properties for durability, conductivity, or flexibility.

SubSections.Title: Synthesize Coatings
SubSections.Content: Create coatings or treatments that modify an object’s surface properties, such as making metal non-conductive or resistant to radiation.

SubSections.Title: Create Wheeled Robot
SubSections.Content: Build a simple autonomous or remote-controlled robot that uses wheels, such as a car or a transporter.

SubSections.Title: Create Legged Robot
SubSections.Content: Build a simple autonomous or remote-controlled robot that uses legs, such as a mouse, a dog or a humanoid.

SubSections.Title: Create Aerial Robot
SubSections.Content: Build a simple autonomous or remote-controlled robot that flies in the air, such as a drone or an airplane. At higher levels, construction of spaceships becomes possible.

SubSections.Title: Create Subnautical Robot
SubSections.Content: Build a simple autonomous or remote-controlled robot that can move underwater, such as a fish or a submarine.

SubSections.Title: Override Robot Directives
SubSections.Content: Temporarily change or disable a robot's default programming to force it to follow new instructions.

SubSections.Title: Access Robot Sensors
SubSections.Content: Remotely tap into a robot's cameras, thermal scans, or other sensors to gather live environmental data.

SubSections.Title: Synchronize Robot Coordination
SubSections.Content: Link multiple robots together to act in tandem.

SubSections.Title: Disguise Robot
SubSections.Content: Modify a robot’s external appearance to make it resemble a normal object, person, or inactive machine to avoid detection.
